name: Dulce y Salado
description: Chantal Tseng of Mockingbird Hill in Washington, D.C. created this coffee-sherry marriage when playing around with the salty-sweet profile of Amoroso or cream sherry.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce cream sherry such as Lustau East India Solera
1 ounce Castries Peanut Rum Cream Liqueur, chilled

recipeInstructions.text: Mix ground coffee and salt on a saucer. Wet half the rim edge of serving glass with water. Dip the wet half of the glass rim in the mixture to rim half the glass.
Stir the sherry, peanut liqueur, and coffee together in a mixing glass without ice. Pour into rimmed serving glass and serve at room temperature.
